description: Deals one slight hit to an enemy. Deals physical or magical damages depending on the weapon held.
deals 3 hits to all enemies, creating a huge tidal wave.
deals 5 hits to an enemy with a majestic blue dragon.
grants attack buff and heals the user by 10% of their max health.
deals 1 hit to all enemies with a light explosion.
deals 4 hits to all enemies with a quick attack, recovering the user’s hp by 30% of damage dealt.
deals 2 hits to an enemy with a powerful attack, penetrating his soul and his defense by 50%.
increase critical rate of the player by 15%. When an enemy is killed, grants Attack buff
sneaks behind an enemy and stabs them, dealing 5 hits. If the enemy is killed by this skill, reset its cooldown.
deals one heavy hit to an enemy, debuffs his defense.
deals one charged hit to an enemy, divided by the missing hp% then heals hp according to damage dealt.
increases defense of the player by 5% every turn, up to 20%.
deals 1 hit to an enemy with all of their strength. If the enemy has a defense debuff, deals an additional 50% damage.
Deals 10 hits to all enemies with sharp feathers.
increases user’s critical damage, attack and critical rate (buff), then gives an additional turn.
increases base attack by 15%, or by 30% if a two-handed sword is equipped.
penetrates the target’s defense by 40% on third skill; if the enemy is debuffed, has a 50% chance to play again.
increases hp by 150% of base attack. Heals 5% of damage dealt.
Inverts the  current weapon’s damage type and increases it by 20%.
Increase hp and defense by 15%. After receiving damage, give a shield equivalent to 5% of max health.
increases magical damages by 50%. Every 2 turns, decreases the third skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Always take the first turn, and convert 50% of defense into attack.
heal for 10% of max health at the end of the turn. Once every 2 turns, give immunity.
If an enemy heals himself, increase the attack by 5%, up to 5 stack.
After an enemy attack, gives a shield, the shield strength is equivalent to 20% of the damage received
Once every turn; cleanse one debuff when attacked
Heals the player by 30% when falling under 20% of max HP // One time use
increase attack by 5%.
increase defense by 5%.
increase hp by 5%.
deals damage equivalent to 20% of the target’s max health. For every turn that has passed, damage increases by 5%, up to 50%.
Deals 50% of physical attack before a 80% chance to decrease the target’s defense by 70% for 2 turns.  // debuff
Gives a shield equivalent to 50% of missing health for 3 turns.
Deals 25% of physical/magic att as true damage. If the player’s physical damage is higher than the enemy, remove all debuffs.
Has a 70% chance to stun for 1 turn and a 100% chance to silence for 2 turns.
deals 50% of magical attack, has a 50% chance to stun the target for 1 turn, and has a 75% chance to increase the target’s third skill cooldown by 2 turns.
Empower your next single target attack by giving a 100% defense penetration rate. Does not work on bosses.
heal for 30% of max health. Increase heal by 10% for each enemy still alive.
Deals damage scaling by the target’s lost health, if the target has 5% hp or lower, execute the target.
Cleanse all debuffs
Remove all buffs from target
Heals 80% of lost health
Increase attack of player for 3 turns
Stun the enemy for 1 turn // High CD
